title: Core registry functions with 1Password Environments
description: Add functions to load registry, detect current project, build MCP config, and generate .env.1password files for 1Password Environments. Use official 'op run --env-file' pattern instead of manual secret injection. See https://developer.1password.com/docs/environments/

acceptanceCriteria.text: _ralph_get_project_config() finds project config by matching cwd to project paths
_ralph_current_project() returns project name for current directory
_ralph_build_mcp_config() merges global MCPs + project-specific MCPs into .mcp.json format
_ralph_generate_env_1password() creates .env.1password file with op:// references from registry secrets
